= Template Tags =

 * {{{ {$article_author} }}}
    Author of the selected article.
 * {{{ {$article_author_title} }}}
    Title of the author of the selected article.
 * {{{ {$article_edit} }}}
    Date/Time of the last edit of the selected article.
 * {{{ {$article_id} }}}
    The unique ID number of the selected article.
 * {{{ {$article_images} }}}
    Associative array of image media (jpeg, gif, png) of the selected article.
 * {{{ {$article_publish} }}}
    Date/Time of the publication of the selected article.
 * {{{ {$article_related} }}}
    Associative array of related media (urls, doc, rtf, pdf) of the selected article.
 * {{{ {$article_section_name} }}}
    Name of the section in which the selected article is published.
 * {{{ {$article_section_url} }}}
    URL of the section in which the selected article is published.
 * {{{ {$article_summary} }}}
    Short summary of the selected article.
 * {{{ {$article_swfs} }}}
    Associative array of Flash media (swfs) of the selected article.   
 * {{{ {$article_text} }}}
    Full text of the selected article.
 * {{{ {$page_title} }}}
    Set to match {{{ {$article_title} }}}.
 * {{{ {$section_headlines} }}}
    Associative array of the headlines in the selected article's section in the current issue.
 * {{{ {$section_name} }}}
    Set to match {{{ {$article_section_name} }}}.
 * {{{ {$section_name_[x]} }}}
    Section name of each section, numbered by section ID.
 * {{{ {$section_summary_[x]} }}}
    Associative array of the headlines in the current issue for each section, numbered by section ID.
 * {{{ {$section_url} }}}
    Set to match {{{ {$article_section_url} }}}.
 * {{{ {$section_url_[x]} }}}
    Section URL of each section, numbered by section ID.
